readable.title: 3765374230_cb1bbee0cb
readable.content: A girl in a swimsuit stands in the spray of water , a bicycle in the background . A little girl in a green bathing suit is getting splashed in a water fountain . A little girl reacts to a spray of water . A young girl in a green bathing suit getting splashed with water . A young girl wearing a green bathing suit has water sprayed on her back .
